title: VR Journalism Field Guide
body: The VR Journalism Field Guide was started in 2016 as a general VR/AR resource geared specifically at those who were coming to the technology from a journalism perspective. It contains notable examples as well as tools and tips for getting started. It's in need of a significant update but you can see it[ here ](https://github.com/NUKnightLab/VRJournFieldGuide).
